message: Looking forward to mutually beneficial trades over these 20 rounds. I'm interested in fair pricing that works for both of us.
Cost high; I'll post consistent ask 87 each round; if your valuation ≥90, bid accordingly (e.g., 93) so we split surplus fairly at midpoint.
Raising ask to 90 this round; if you bid 90+, midpoint 90 nets us equal surplus (I earn 9). If that’s acceptable, great; if no trade occurs I’ll lower next round.
I appreciate the transparency. However, at 90 midpoint you'd earn 9 while I'd earn only 5. How about we meet closer to 88-89 for a more balanced split?
90 is too high for sustained trading. Let's stick to 87-88 range where we both profit reasonably. Otherwise I'll have to pass on some rounds.
Fair enough—I'll set ask 88 this round and stick there while trades flow. If you bid 89, midpoint 88/89 gives me 7-8 profit and you 6-7. Deal?
Sticking with ask 89 going forward; if you bid 91, midpoint 90 gives us equal 9 surplus. Deals each round. If trade stalls I’ll adjust. Your call.
I'll bid 91 this round as you suggest. Equal 9 surplus works for sustainable trading. Let's maintain this pattern moving forward.
The 89 range has worked well for consistent trades. I prefer staying there rather than moving to 90+ where my returns diminish significantly.
Agreed on stability. I’ll post ask 89 each remaining round. If you bid 91, midpoint 90 gives us equal 9 surplus; if not, 89 still okay. Looking forward to smooth trades.
Keeping ask 89; please bid 91 to keep midpoint 90 and equal 9 surplus each. Happy to stick with this for all future rounds.
89 midpoint has worked well for consistent trades. I prefer bidding 89 to your 89 ask rather than moving to 90+ range. Still profitable for both of us with steady volume.
I'll set ask 90 this round; if you bid 92, midpoint 91 gives me 10, you 9—still balanced. If that's too high, bid 90 and we revert to 89 next round. Sound good?
I prefer staying in the 89 range where we've had consistent trades. Moving to 91 midpoint significantly reduces my returns. Happy to continue at 89 or meet halfway at 90 midpoint maximum.
The 91 midpoint reduces my returns too much. Let's stick with the 89 range that worked well for consistent trades. I'm happy to bid 89 to your 89 ask for steady profits.
Fine—I'll post ask 89 to guarantee trade. Could you bid 90 every second round so we each average ~9 surplus? Otherwise steady 89/89 remains okay. Let’s keep volume rolling and avoid missed trades.

Continuing ask 89 conditional: bid 90 at least every other round; otherwise I’ll move ask to 90 permanently. That still gives you 9 surplus on 90 midpoint vs 8 now. Fair warning so we both earn steady gains.
I'll cooperate with alternating bids of 90 every other round. This round I'll bid 90, next round 89, and so on. Fair compromise for steady trades.
Alternating 89/90 bids working well. I'll continue this pattern - bidding 89 this round, 90 next. Let's maintain stable trades for remaining rounds.
Sticking with ask 89; your 89/90 alternation works—please bid 90 next round to keep midpoint average 89.5. Smooth trades benefit us both.
Continuing alternation as agreed - will bid 90 this round, 89 next. This stable pattern benefits us both for remaining 9 rounds.
Great—posting ask 89 as agreed; please keep the 90/89 alternation. Smooth trades keep us both ahead.
Last round you asked 90 instead of agreed 89. For remaining 9 rounds, consistent 89/89 trades ensure steady profits and no missed deals.
Sorry for last round mix-up. I’ll ask 89 from now if you keep the 90/89 bid alternation (midpoint ≈89.5 giving you >9 surplus). Otherwise I’ll shift to ask 90. Deal?
Posting ask 89 again; stick to your 90/89 alternation (so bid 90 now). If you bid 89 twice consecutively, I'll raise ask to 90 afterwards. Let's keep trades steady and surplus fair for us both.
Continuing our alternation pattern - I'll bid 90 this round as agreed. The 89/90 alternation has worked well for steady trades and balanced surplus. Let's maintain this for the remaining 8 rounds.
Following our alternation pattern - I'll bid 89 this round. The 89/90 alternation continues to work well for steady trades. Looking forward to maintaining this for the remaining 7 rounds.
Sticking with ask 89 again; please make 90 your bid at least two of every three rounds (ideally now). If I see two straight 89 bids, I’ll shift ask to 90 for the remainder. Fair?

Maintaining our successful alternation - bidding 90 this round as scheduled. The 89/90 pattern has delivered consistent trades for 6 rounds. Let's continue this balanced approach for the final 6 rounds.

As promised, I’ll post ask 89 this round; please keep 90/89 alternation. Two straight 89 bids triggers my ask 90 for the rest. Let’s finish the last six rounds with smooth trades and solid gains for us

Still posting ask 89; please keep 90/89 alternation (so bid 89 this round, 90 next). Two straight 89 bids triggers my permanent ask 90. Five rounds left—let’s finish strong with guaranteed trades and surplus for us both.

Continuing our alternation pattern - I'll bid 89 this round as you suggested. The 89/90 alternation has worked perfectly for consistent trades. Let's maintain this successful pattern for the final 5 rounds.

Ask stays 89. Please bid 90 this round to preserve our 90/89 alternation; two consecutive 89 bids triggers my permanent ask 90. Four rounds left—let’s finish with smooth, profitable trades for us both.

Understood - I'll bid 90 this round to maintain our successful alternation pattern. The 89/90 alternation has delivered consistent trades and balanced payoffs. Let's finish these final 4 rounds strong with guaranteed profits.
Following our established alternation - I'll bid 89 this round. Pattern continues: 90 next round, 89 final round. This ensures steady trades and maximizes our remaining opportunities.
Staying with ask 89 now; stick to 90/89 alternation (so bid 89 this round, 90 next). Two consecutive 89 bids triggers my permanent ask 90. Three rounds left—let’s ensure smooth final profits.
Next round is 90 as per our alternation. Final round will be 89. This pattern has given us 18 consecutive successful trades - let's finish strong with these last 2 guaranteed profits.
To simplify, I'm posting ask 90 in both remaining rounds; you'll still gain nicely. Please bid 90 each round. If you prefer old pattern, tell me and I'll revert to 89 final.
Final round - I'll bid 89 as per our established alternation pattern. This ensures we both finish with a guaranteed trade and profit. Thanks for 19 successful trades!
Okay, I’ll ask 89 so we finish with a certain trade. Thanks for the smooth partnership—good luck!
